screen.title: Community support

summary.p: Mailing lists and web forums are traditionally where free software projects answer user support questions. However, it can be difficult to capture that knowledge and make it available to your community.
Launchpad's Answer Tracker makes it easy for users to ask questions and stores your community's answers in a searchable knowledge-base.

screen.callout: New users can find mailing lists and forums intimidating. Launchpad uses a simple guided process to take the pain out of asking a support question.
Launchpad turns previous support requests into a knowledge-base for your project. Users can help themselves by searching past support questions and answers.

Launchpad helps your community translate your software into hundreds of languages. Localised versions of your application are even more useful if users can find support in their own language. Launchpad lets people request help and answer support requests in their own language. It also filters knowledge-base searches according to each user's preferred languages.

Launchpad helps support teams to organise themselves and uses karma to reward people for answering support requests. Any individual or team can ask Launchpad to tell them when there is a new support request in their language.

screen.title: Question detail
screen.callout: Many support requests need discussion before a good answer is found. Launchpad helps your community track the conversation and offers both web and email interfaces to people who want to take part.
If a long conversation develops around a user support request and several possible solutions are suggested, the original user can highlight the answer they found most useful.

Sometimes, a support request arises because of a software bug. Your community's support team can generate bug reports from support requests. So that everyone can follow the discussion, Launchpad links the original support request to the new bug report.

transition.p: Thank you for joining us on our tour of Launchpad. If you'd like to read more about how Launchpad works, follow our detailed feature tour. Or you can talk to us: email info@launchpad.net.
